title: Cosmic Canvas.
content:
Welcome to Cosmic Canvas! Our website is dedicated to bringing you the most stunning and captivating abstract images of deep space objects. Our wallpapers feature swirling colors and patterns that will transport you to another dimension.

With our vast collection of high-quality wallpapers, you can easily transform your desktop or mobile device into a mesmerizing work of art. Whether you're a space enthusiast or just appreciate beautiful imagery, Cosmic Canvas has something for everyone.

Our wallpapers are carefully curated to ensure the highest quality and resolution, so you can enjoy every detail of these breathtaking images. So why settle for a boring, plain background when you can have a stunning piece of art that will inspire and delight you every day?

Join us on this cosmic journey and let our wallpapers take you on a visual adventure through the depths of space.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a deep space object, such as a black hole or pulsar, with swirling colors and patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
